attributes.additional_details:
2010 election for new NHS changes were promised  by the Conservatives to "PUTTING PATIENTS FIRST".
This promise has been broken by Jeremy Hunt MP before its introduction 1.04.2013 by altering a sentence in the original new NHS document to "ASPIRE" to put patients first. This means to many probably or not at all.
Broken promises by the Tories again. I am appalled about this change and wish the sentence to be put back to PUTTING PATIENTS FIRST.
